name: Aazelchi's Messaging Service
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 34

Didn't have time to finish it properly for Ludum Dare 34 so decided it was a good opportunity to finish it for Finish It Jam.

Here at Aazelchi's Messaging Service we pride ourselves on customer service.

Being the connection between their messages makes us somewhat of a match maker.
We've seen it all breakups, hookups, ups and downs, downs and ups. You name an up or down and we've seen it.

Being your first day on the job, we'll start you off with an easy one. Navigate the message spark across the wires to the final endpoint. Make sure you don't get lost along the way, we don't want those important messages not making it to their target.

Controls:

Windows - Use arrow keys to turn when able to but make sure you don't miss the turn 

Android - Click left side of screen to turn left and right side of screen to turn right
